site_name: Pizza Express94 Dulwich VillageLondonSouthwarkSE21 7AQ
description: To vary the layout of the premises in accordance with plans submitted by the applicant. This will include an extension of the licensed area on the ground floor to include a small outside area. To add OFF sales to the licence from 11:00 to 00:00 Monday to Saturday and 12:00 to 23:30 on Sunday (in line with ON sales). To add the following conditions to Annex 2 of the licence, as agreed with licensing officer Ian Clements on behalf of Southwark police licensing: Off sales will be ancillary to a takeaway meal (either delivery or collection) Off sales will be in sealed containers only, save for any external area used for that purpose. The outside area will close no later than 10pm
